titles: To you that are called Anabaptists in the nation of Ireland teachers and people, who profess your selves to be the Church of Christ; this is the word of the Lord God unto you.
author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
keywords: Anabaptists --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
